component.name: IcedLens
component.summary: Privacy-first media viewer and editor with AI enhancement

description.p: IcedLens is a fast, privacy-focused media viewer and editor built with Rust. View and edit images and videos with powerful AI-powered features, all running locally on your machine without any cloud uploads or telemetry.

ul.li: View images (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, TIFF, BMP, ICO, SVG) and videos (MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, WebM)
Non-destructive editing: rotate, crop, resize, adjust brightness and contrast
Full undo/redo history - experiment freely without losing your original
AI-powered deblurring using NAFNet neural network
AI upscaling up to 4x resolution with Real-ESRGAN
Edit EXIF metadata (camera info, GPS, timestamps) and XMP/Dublin Core fields
Video playback with frame-by-frame navigation, speed control (0.1x-8x), and volume boost
Filter media by type, orientation, or date range
Multilingual interface (English, French, Spanish, German, Italian)

description.p: AI features are optional and download models from Hugging Face on first use. All processing happens locally - your files never leave your computer.

screenshot.caption: Image viewer with zoom and navigation controls
Video playback with timeline and speed controls
Non-destructive image editing with live preview
EXIF and XMP metadata viewing and editing

ul.li: Media filters: filter by type (images/videos), orientation, or date range
XMP metadata support for PNG, WebP, and TIFF files
Temporary rotation in viewer (R / Shift+R)
Flatpak packaging for easier Linux installation
Natural alphabetical sorting matching file managers
Audio controls disabled with tooltip when media has no audio
Reorganized toolbar for better UX
Fixed audio on surround sound systems and non-standard sample rates
Fixed frame-by-frame navigation and video seeking issues
Improved audio/video synchronization
Volume amplification up to 150% for quiet videos
Video playback speed control (0.1x to 8x)
Mouse wheel zoom and grab-to-pan in image editor
AI upscaling with Real-ESRGAN (4x resolution)
Auto-skip corrupted files during navigation
Resize preview thumbnail before applying
Larger crop handles for easier selection
Better tooltip visibility on all themes
Resize scale maximum increased to 400%
